casebody.data:
Andy Learon CRABTREE and Carol Ann Crabtree
v.
Elesha M. SMITH d/b/a The Law Firm of Elesha M. Smith; Bank of America, N.A. f/k/a BAC Home Loans Servicing, LP; Rushmore Loan Management Services, LLC; and U.S. Bank, N.A. No. 176P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Mr. Benjamin D. Busch, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Crabtree, Andy Learon, et al. Mr. Scott I. Perle, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Bank of America, N.A. Ms. Renner Jo St. John, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mr. John T. Benjamin, Jr., Attorney at Law, Ms. Aleksandra E. Anderson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Rushmore Loan Management Services, LLC, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of June 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
